lead_paragraph: Like some other recent N.B.A. champions, Cleveland has taken the Larry O’Brien Trophy on tour, but the extent to which they have embraced the trophy is unique.

headline.print_headline: To the Victorious Cavaliers Go the Spoils of Prized Company
headline.main: Cavaliers’ Reward for the Title Is to Share a Prized Trophy

snippet: Like some other recent N.B.A. champions, Cleveland has taken the Larry O’Brien Trophy on tour, but the extent to which they have embraced the trophy is unique....
abstract: Members of Cleveland Cavaliers have taken Larry O'Brien Trophy, which teams receive when they become NBA champions, to number of well-publicized outings; practice has been increasingly popular in NBA and is modeled on way NHL teams take Stanley Cup on tour, but for Cavaliers it is of particular note, as it represents first championship win for city.
